Title: ZoomPanel
Description: This is a control for silverlight that displays Items and Zooms in the one the Mouse is over. It behaves like the Apple Dock (at least similar to it)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a control for silverlight that displays Items and Zooms in the one the Mouse is over. It behaves like the Apple Dock (at least similar to it)

Get more infos at: http://www.meirhuber.de/Projects/sl/ZoomPanel/Default.aspx
